About Me

My name is Jisu Kim and I’m a machine learning software engineer and researcher.

I’m interested in overall machine learning engineering, including computer vision.

My particular interest in how to collect and refine data to create meaningful machine learning data and how to design a network effectively.

Here is my development portfolio.

Development of AI Interior service with diffusion

(Jul. 2023 ~ Aug. 2023)

  • Develop a service that can change the interior style based on the user’s render shot

Development of a model that separates rooms with complex structures into meaningful areas

(Apr. 2023 ~ Apr. 2023)

  • Develop of a model to separate meaningful subrooms for living rooms, kitchens, and dining rooms

Research on generative AI

(Mar. 2023 ~ present)

  • Research on the various methods with a diffusion technique that can be used for drawing images, render shots, etc.

Development of render shot score measurement model and designing an automated learning process

(Dec. 2022 ~ Feb. 2023)

  • Develop and upgrade a model that scores the quality of render shots and design processes that automatically learn and update a model with user feedback

Development of furniture location recommendation model

(Oct. 2022 ~ Nov. 2022)

  • Develop a model that recommends the appropriate location of the furniture selected by the user in consideration of the room structure and the location of the arranged furniture

Development of automatic dimension line recognition function of drawing

(Jul. 2022 ~ Sep. 2022)

  • Develop the ability to automatically recognize the dimension lines contained in the drawing image to read the dimension values and automate the ability to upload the drawing image in Archisketch service

Development of product recommendation service

(Jun. 2022 ~ Jul. 2022)

  • Develop a service that analyzes the association of furniture used together within the Archisketch project and recommends furniture that would be good to place with the furniture selected by the user

Development of recommendation service for render shot location

(May. 2022 ~ Jun. 2022)

  • Develop a service that analyzes the structure of the room selected by the user and recommends a location where a good render shot can be taken

Development of a model that classifies a room type

(Mar. 2022 ~ May. 2022)

  • Develop a model for inferring the room type of a render shot based on the render shot generated on the Archisketch platform and the furniture contained in the render shot

(Oct. 2021 ~ Feb. 2022)
